intro.description: Learn how to use Project Examples Wizard.

item.title: Open the Seam perspective
item.description: If you're not already in the Seam perspective, in the main menu select Window > Open Perspective > Other > Seam or click on the "Click to Perform" link below.

item.title: Setup the Environment
item.description:
You must set up your environment before performing the steps in this tutorial.
If you have JBoss Developer Studio with EAP installed, your environment is already set correctly.

subitem.label: Create JBoss AS Runtime and Server using "File > New > Other > Server > Server" and select "JBoss Comunity" or "JBoss Enterprise Middleware" server type or click the "Click to Perform" link.
Create a Seam Runtime using "Window > Preferences > JBoss Tools > Web > Seam." or click the "Click to Perform" link.
Create a Database Connection Profile by selecting "File > New > Other > Connection Profiles > Connection Profile." or click the "Click to Perform" link.

item.title: Call the Project Examples wizard
item.description:
Click Help > Project Examples or the "Click to Perform" link below.
If you don't have JBoss Developer Studio with EAP, you will have to set your Server Runtime, Seam Runtime and Database Connection Profile. After importing the project example, you will be able to use the Quick Fix dialog to set them.
